001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import androidx.room.Update;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
011import java.time.Instant;
012import java.util.List;
013
014@Dao
015public interface LocationDao {
016
017  String LOCATION_QUERY = "SELECT * FROM location";
018  String LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_SECURE = "SELECT * FROM location WHERE secure = :secure";
019  String LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_TRACKING = "SELECT * FROM location WHERE tracked = true";
020  String LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_TIME = "SELECT * FROM location WHERE timestamp > :hourStart AND timestamp < :hourStop";
021  String TRUNCATION_QUERY = "DELETE FROM location";
022
023  @Insert
024  Single<Long> insert(Location location);
025
026  @Update
027  Completable update(Location location);
028
029  @Query(LOCATION_QUERY)
030  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocation();
031
032  @Query(LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_SECURE)
033  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocation(boolean secure);
034
035  @Query(LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_TRACKING)
036  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocationTracking();
037
038  @Query(LOCATION_QUERY_FOR_TIME)
039  LiveData<List<Location>> getLocation(Instant hourStart, Instant hourStop);
040
041  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY)
042  Completable truncateLocation();
043}
